product_name: Cane Creek Thudbuster LT Suspension Seatpost
long_description: Take the edge off of thuds, bumps and jolts with the Cane Creek Thudbuster LT suspension seatpost, which offers up to 3 in. of travel for excellent comfort and control. Whether riding long, rough roads or ripping down trails, the Thudbuster offers added comfort for any ride or bike. Long travel (LT) version provides up to 3 in. of travel to cushion impacts, absorb bumps and smooth out uneven surface. Travel is achieved using a patented, continuously-responsive parallel-linkage design paired with 2-stage elastomer. User-serviceable linkage pivots have stainless-steel axles with Teflon(R) coated bushings for enhanced longevity. Includes soft, medium and firm elastomers so you can easily tune suspension feel and response. Recommended maximum rider weight: 250 lbs.
short_description: Take the edge off of thuds, bumps and jolts with the Cane Creek Thudbuster LT suspension seatpost, which offers up to 3 in. of travel for excellent comfort and control.
